code: import React,{useEffect,useRef}from'react';import{FaLinkedin,FaGithub,FaEnvelope}from'react-icons/fa';import'./Contact.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Contact(){const contactRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{const observer=new IntersectionObserver(_ref=>{let[entry]=_ref;if(entry.isIntersecting){contactRef.current.classList.add('animate');}},{threshold:0.1});if(contactRef.current){observer.observe(contactRef.current);}return()=>{if(contactRef.current){observer.unobserve(contactRef.current);}};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact-container",ref:contactRef,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"contact-title",children:"Connect with Me"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:"https://www.linkedin.com/in/kenishadcosta/",target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"contact-button linkedin",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaLinkedin,{className:"contact-icon"}),"LinkedIn"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:"https://github.com/kenishadcosta",target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"contact-button github",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaGithub,{className:"contact-icon"}),"GitHub"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:"mailto:kenishadcosta@gmail.com",className:"contact-button gmail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaEnvelope,{className:"contact-icon"}),"Email"]})]})]});}export default Contact;
